amendment.description: Amendment prohibits any redirection of funds allocated under the Gulf of Mexico Energy Security Act (GOMESA).
amendment.purpose: An amendment to prohibit the use of funds to be used to propose legislation to redirect funds allocated under section 105(a)(2)(A) of the Gulf of Mexico Energy Security Act of 2006.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Byrne amendment (A069) Agreed to by voice vote.

action.text: Amendment agreed to Committee of the Whole
House amendment agreed to: On agreeing to the Byrne amendment (A069) Agreed to by voice vote.
House amendment offered/reported by : Amendment (A069) offered by Mr. Byrne.
